main event: An unidentified flying object was observed on February 12, 1966, approximately 30 feet in diameter, silver in color, hovering over Barrow, Alaska, for several minutes before rapidly accelerating away.
interesting points: The object was confirmed by multiple witnesses to be round and silver,The maximum altitude reached by the object was approximately 30 feet,The object hovered silently before departure,The sighting was reported to local authorities immediately after occurrence,Investigation revealed no physical evidence left at the scene.
witness description: local residents observing the object from a distance
